reviewDescription: You can't really hear this refrigerator making noise! Almost dead silent. Draws very little power. I am off grid with 15KW of power I need to be efficient. I don't need a freezer so for a 4.4 cubic feet space it holds a lot! I got and ice maker for that.
This fridge is super quiet compared to our old one. It has a nice light inside and plenty of space for lots of drinks. I would highly recommend.
Great for extra room for main refrigerator/drinks
